name: ObjectWin Technology
description: ObjectWin provides global workforce solutions to meet current and future business demands of our customers. Our services include, various workforce solutions, SOW based projects and fulltime resource deployments. We serve our customers both nationally and globally. ObjectWin has been a leader in the staffing space for last two decades. We are known for our industry knowledge, worker’s quality, compliance, customer-centric approach, and flexibility. Our center of excellence has built best practice in the staffing resulting in enhanced quality & efficiently and lower costs & risks.
business_objectives: Boost Hiring Manager Confidence and Productivity
Hire Top Talent Faster and More Efficiently
Headline: Workforce and IT solutions
ShortDescription: ObjectWin Technology is a minority business enterprise providing staffing services to Global enterprises and Fortune 1000 companies across US and India.
enhanced_description: ObjectWin Technology is a global workforce solutions provider specializing in staffing services and IT solutions. With over two decades of leadership in the staffing space, ObjectWin offers various workforce solutions, including SOW-based projects and full-time resource deployments. They serve global enterprises and Fortune 1000 companies across the US and India. ObjectWin is recognized for its industry knowledge, worker quality, compliance, customer-centric approach, and flexibility, with a focus on best practices to enhance quality and efficiency while lowering costs and risks.
competitive_advantages: Two decades of leadership in staffing
scalability_features: Serves Global enterprises and Fortune 1000 companies
